description: This file declares the 'Request' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which represents a JSON-RPC request message used in WebSocket communication. It includes methods for creating requests, generating IDs, and converting the request to a string, along with private members for ID management.

classes.name: Request
classes.description: A class representing a JSON-RPC request message for WebSocket communication, including methods for creation, identification, and serialization.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a JSON-RPC request with a specified method name and parameters.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the request.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Serializes the request to a string format.

methods.name: generateId
methods.description: Generates a unique ID for the request; private method.
